t:
“Will you marry me?”, as she sipped the wine out of her glass.



                                                  with chokes, coughs and blood as the sharp edges from the proposal ring dugs deep into her throat.
c:
That's some bloody deep love.

The ring was in the wine glass, the classic proposal idea.
